awd_titl_txt: Analyses of Structured Computational Problems and Parallel  Iterative Algorithms
awd_abstract_narration: The main objectives of the research planned is the analysis                of large scale structured computational problems and of                         the convergence of parallel iterative methods for solving linear                systems.  More specifically: (i) Estimation of condition numbers                of structured maps.  (ii) Round-off error analysis of algorithms                specially tailored for solving structured computational problems.               (iii) Applications of these techniques to the solution of large                 sparse and dense structured systems of linear equations and                     integral equations as well as to other structured computational                 problems.  (iv) Analysis of convergence and acceleration                        synchronous and asynchronous iteration algorithms for solving                   large sparse systems of linear equations and their                              implementations on respective SIMD and MIMD parallel computer                   architectures.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
